info.longBusinessSummary: Resorttrust, Inc. engages in the hotel and restaurant business in Japan. It operates through three segments: Membership business, Hotel and Restaurant business, and medical business. The company sells hotel memberships, money lending to members, as well as constructing member-only hotels. It also operates 42 resort hotels and city hotels in Japan and 1 in Hawaii, as well as 14 golf courses in Japan. In addition, the company provides hotel cleaning services, insurance agency services, and sells hair accessories and other products. Further, it offers medical memberships, medical equipment rental, management services, medical consulting services, home care services, etc. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.
